009package imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving;
010
011import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.Kernel2D;
012import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
013
014public interface TschumperleDericheF {
015
016        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
017                
018                @DialogLabel("Number of iterations")
019                public int iterations = 20;     
020                
021                @DialogLabel("dt (Time step)")
022                public double dt = 20.0;                
023                
024                @DialogLabel("Gradient smoothing (sigmaD)")
025                public double sigmaD  = 0.5;
026                
027                @DialogLabel("Structure tensor smoothing (sigmaM)")
028                public double sigmaM  = 0.5;
029                
030                @DialogLabel("Diffusion limiter along minimal variations (a0)") //small value = strong smoothing
031                public float a0 = 0.25f;        
032                
033                @DialogLabel("Diffusion limiter along maximal variations (a1)") //small value = strong smoothing
034                public float a1 = 0.90f;
035                
036                /** The alpha value applied in the first pass. */
037                @DialogHide
038                public float alpha0 = 0.5f;
039        }
040        
041
042        abstract class Constants {
043                private static final float C1 = (float) (2 - Math.sqrt(2.0)) / 4;
044                private static final float C2 = (float) (Math.sqrt(2.0) - 1) / 2;
045
046                private static final float[][] Hdx = // gradient kernel X
047                        {{-C1, 0, C1},
048                         {-C2, 0, C2},
049                         {-C1, 0, C1}};
050                
051                private static final float[][] Hdy = // gradient kernel Y
052                        {{-C1, -C2, -C1},
053                         {  0,   0,   0},
054                         { C1,  C2,  C1}};
055                
056                protected static final Kernel2D kernelDx = new Kernel2D(Hdx, 1, 1, false);
057                protected static final Kernel2D kernelDy = new Kernel2D(Hdy, 1, 1, false);
058        }
059        
060
061        
062
063}
